text: Erik Tul (born 1 August 1975) is a Slovenian rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Slovenia Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:People from Izola
title: Erik Tul
